alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 9:01PM AKST until December 21 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, are expected. Visibility will be less than one half mile at times. * WHERE...Summits along the Steese Highway and the surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southwest winds gusting to 40 mph will produce low visibilities in blowing snow tonight. Conditions will improve Tuesday as winds decrease. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
